headline: Zoetis Declares First Quarter 2025 Dividend; Board Approves 16% Payment Increase
summary: PARSIPPANY, N.J., December 12, 2024--The Board of Directors of Zoetis Inc. (NYSE:ZTS) has declared a dividend of $0.50 per share for the first quarter of 2025, an increase of 16% from the quarterly dividend rate paid in 2024. The dividend will be paid on Tuesday, March 4, 2025, to all holders of record of the Company’s common stock as of the close of business on Tuesday, January 21, 2025.
